titles: Iustifying faith, or The faith by which the just do liue A treatise, containing a description of the nature, properties and conditions of Christian faith. With a discouerie of misperswasions, breeding presumption or hypocrisie, and meanes how faith may be planted in vnbeleeuers. By Thomas Iackson B. of Diuinitie and fellow of Corpus Christi Colledge in Oxford.
Commentaries upon the Apostles Creed. Book 4
author: Jackson, Thomas, 1579-1640.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Beale, dwelling in Aldersgate streete,
notes: Book 4 of the author's "Commentaries upon the Apostles Creed".
L7 and O7 are cancels. Variant: L7 and O7 are cancellanda; O7 contains text for cancel L7; text for O7 lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
